### Info about HR Team

**Changes in salaries**
June 8 - the sieemma salary has been changed from 5 to 10 tJOY/block
June 10 - the adovrn salary has been changed from 18 to 23 tJOY/block
June 11 - the halk99 salary has been changed from 5 to 1 tJOY/block
